name: Urban Zombie - The Infection is Coming to Your Neighborhood
blurb: An augmented reality iPhone game that brings the zombies to YOUR city. Connect with friends and cleanse the streets.

rewards.reward: No Reward
1 free Zombie to do your bidding and access to the UZ private forums. Your name in the credits as a Kickstarter BRONZE Contributor.
Start your squad off right, 5 Free Zombies and access to the UZ private forums. Your name in the credits as a Kickstarter BRONZE Contributor.
Everything in the $15 pledge (5 Zombies, Bronze Credit, Forum Access), PLUS you'll get 2x experience buff for 3 months.
[EARLY-BIRD SPECIAL] Everything in the $40 pledge, but for just $35. This is only available to the first 250 people who pledge at this level.
Why have a squad when you can have a platoon?! 10 Free Zombie and 2x experience buff for 6 months and access to the UZ private forums. Your name in the credits as a Kickstarter SILVER Contributor.

[EARLY-BIRD SPECIAL] Everything in the $40 pledge (10 Zombies, 2x Exp and SILVER Credit), PLUS the official Urban Zombie t-shirt with BACKER clearly printed on the back for everyone to know that you are one of the official supporters of the game and your name in the credits as a Kickstarter SILVER Contributor. (Please add $15 to your pledge if international shipping applies)

Everything in the $40 pledge (10 Zombies, 2x Exp and SILVER Credit), PLUS the Golden Shotgun to show off during game play to let everyone else know that you helped Kickstart Urban Zombie and  a Premiere Sponsor's Badge that will show in your user's profile stats for all UZ players to see.

[EARLY-BIRD SPECIAL] Everything in the $60 pledge (Sponsor Badge, Golden Shotgun, 10 Zombies, 2x Exp and SILVER Credit),  PLUS the official Urban Zombie iPhone case to show that you are one of the official supporters of the game. (Please add $10 to your pledge if international shipping applies)

Everything in the $60 pledge (Sponsor Badge, Golden Shotgun, 10 Zombies, and 2x Exp), PLUS the official Urban Zombie t-shirt with BACKER clearly printed on the back for everyone to know that you are one of the official supporters of the game and your name in the credits as a Kickstarter GOLD Contributor. (Please add $15 to your pledge if international shipping applies)

Everything in the $100 pledge (Sponsor Badge, Golden Shotgun, 10 Zombies, 2x Exp and GOLD Credit), PLUS the official Urban Zombie iPhone case to show that you are one of the official supporters of the game. (Please add $10 to your pledge if international shipping applies)

Everything in the $100 pledge (Sponsor Badge, Golden Shotgun, 10 Zombies, 2x Exp and GOLD Credit), PLUS the official t-shirt and a gicl\u00e9e print of the Urban Zombie art poster signed by the development team. (Please add $15 to your pledge if international shipping applies)

Everything in the $100 pledge (Sponsor Badge, Golden Shotgun, 10 Zombies, 2x Exp and GOLD Credit), PLUS  the official iPhone case and a gicl\u00e9e print of the Urban Zombie art poster signed by the development team. (Please add $10 to your pledge if international shipping applies)

[LIMITED EDITION] Everything in the $100 pledge (Sponsor Badge, Golden Shotgun, 10 Zombies, 2x Exp and GOLD Credit), PLUS your choice of the official t-shirt or iphone case. A limited edition artist signed and numbered gicl\u00e9e print of the Urban Zombie art poster signed by the development team. This is only available to the first 20 people who pledge at this level because of the limited edition print. (Please add $15 to your pledge if international shipping applies)

Everything in the $250 pledge (Gicl\u00e9e Print, Sponsor Badge, Golden Shotgun, 10 Zombies, and 2x Exp), PLUS both the t-shirt and iPhone case and an invitaion to the offficial Urban Zombiel launch party in Dallas TX. Your name in the credits as a Kickstarter PLATINUM Contributor. (Note: Travel expenses not included) (Please add $15 to your pledge if international shipping applies)

Everything in the $500 pledge (T-Shirt, iPhone Case, Gicl\u00e9e Print, Sponsor Badge, Golden Shotgun, 10 Zombies, and 2x Exp), PLUS Beta access to all future updates releases of the game. See the game before anyone else and participate on the private beta forums. (Please add $15 to your pledge if international shipping applies)

Everything in the $750 pledge (Beta Releases, Party invite, T-Shirt, iPhone Case, Gicl\u00e9e Print, Sponsor Badge, Golden Shotgun, 10 Zombies, and 2x Exp), PLUS  2 Sponsor Zombies that have a shorter respawning period and can jump to front of the Zombie line. This means your Zombies will earn more brain and experience than any other Zombie in the game. To top it all off, we will give you the option to name your Sponsor Zombies. (Please add $15 to your pledge if international shipping applies)

Let yourself be heard, be one of the moans or groans of our Zombies PLUS everything in the $1000 pledge (2 Sponsor Zombies, Beta Releases, Party invite, T-Shirt, iPhone Case, Gicl\u00e9e Print, Sponsor Badge, Golden Shotgun, 10 Zombies, and 2x Exp) (Please add $15 to your pledge if international shipping applies)

You have something to say? You get be one of the sounds of our player PLUS everything in the $1000 pledge (2 Sponsor Zombies, Beta Releases, Party invite, T-Shirt, iPhone Case, Gicl\u00e9e Print, Sponsor Badge, Golden Shotgun, 10 Zombies, and 2x Exp) (Please add $15 to your pledge if international shipping applies)

Better to be seen than heard? You get to have a picture of your face blended into one of our Zombie textures, by our graphic art team, for all the UZ world to see PLUS everything in the $1000 pledge (2 Sponsor Zombies, Beta Releases, Party invite, T-Shirt, iPhone Case, Gicl\u00e9e Print, Sponsor Badge, Golden Shotgun, 10 Zombies, and 2x Exp) (Please add $15 to your pledge if international shipping applies)
